page.title: 16Employment in Norwell
page.content: Years ago most people who lived in this area worked on the land, very close to home. Our research showed that 82% of males travel further than 1 mile to work with many far in excess of this. We found 59% of families have more than 1 motor car. Our research showed................................ {............. Women at Work........... 23% of mothers work part time 22% of mothers work full time 55% of mothers are not employed {.............Shopping Trends......... 41% use village shop most days 27% use village shop some days 32% use village shop very rarely {..........Weekly Food Shopping....... 68% shop in Newark 16% shop in Lincoln 8% shop in Nottingham 8% shop in Retford 0% shop in Norwell
